data.strFullDescription:
The Steam 360 Video Player allows SteamVR compatible VR headsets to playback Steam 360 Video content that can be found on the Steam Store. Once installed, you can [url=http://store.steampowered.com/search/?sort_by=Released_DESC&tags=-1&category1=992%2C996&vrsupport=402]find 360 videos on the Steam store[/url].

The Steam 360 Video Player is currently in Beta. More information about the [url=https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871#360]360 Video Beta can be found here[/url].

[b][i]Update: An early test for Non-HMD playback is now available in the build released 7/7/2017.[/i][/b]
data.strSnippet: The Steam 360 Video Player allows SteamVR compatible VR headsets to playback Steam 360 Video content that can be found on the Steam Store.
